= Introduction =

This page serves as the homepage for the wiki.  From here you will find links to the following:

 * Feature Specifications
 * Functional Specifications
 * Technical Specifications

==Terminology used==

Feature Specification: A document that encompasses a specific feature of the system.  This document includes the following elements:

 * Description and Priority
 * Stimulus/Response Sequences
 * Functional Requirements
 * Wireframes
 * Finished Screenshots
